com.facebook.litho.config

Class ComponentsConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.config.ComponentsConfiguration

  • public class ComponentsConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Hi there, traveller! This configuration class is not meant to be used by end-users of Litho. It contains mainly flags for features that are either under active development and not ready for public consumption, or for use in experiments.

    These values are safe defaults and should not require manual changes.

    • Field Detail

      • IS_INTERNAL_BUILD

        public static final boolean IS_INTERNAL_BUILD
        Indicates whether this is an internal build. Note that the implementation of BuildConfig that this class is compiled against may not be the one that is included in the APK. See: android_build_config.

      • USE_INCREMENTAL_MOUNT_HELPER

        public static final boolean USE_INCREMENTAL_MOUNT_HELPER
        Indicates that the incremental mount helper is required for this build.

      • CAN_CHECK_GLOBAL_ANIMATOR_SETTINGS

        public static final boolean CAN_CHECK_GLOBAL_ANIMATOR_SETTINGS
        Whether we can access properties in Settings.Global for animations.

      • NEEDS_THEME_SYNCHRONIZATION

        public static final boolean NEEDS_THEME_SYNCHRONIZATION
        Whether we need to account for lack of synchronization while accessing Themes.

      • DEFAULT_BACKGROUND_THREAD_PRIORITY

        public static int DEFAULT_BACKGROUND_THREAD_PRIORITY
        The default priority for threads that perform background layout calculations.

      • DEFAULT_CHANGE_SET_THREAD_PRIORITY

        public static final int DEFAULT_CHANGE_SET_THREAD_PRIORITY
        The default priority for threads that perform background sections change set calculations.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • isDebugModeEnabled

        public static boolean isDebugModeEnabled
        Option to enabled debug mode. This will save extra data asscociated with each node and allow more info about the hierarchy to be retrieved. Used to enable stetho integration. It is highly discouraged to enable this in production builds. Due to how the Litho releases are distributed in open source IS_INTERNAL_BUILD will always be false. It is therefore required to override this value using your own application build configs. Recommended place for this is in a Application subclass onCreate() method.

      • isDebugHierarchyEnabled

        public static boolean isDebugHierarchyEnabled
        Lightweight tracking of component class hierarchy of MountItems.

      • debugHighlightInteractiveBounds

        public static boolean debugHighlightInteractiveBounds
        Debug option to highlight interactive areas in mounted components.

      • enableLithoViewDebugOverlay

        public static boolean enableLithoViewDebugOverlay
        LithoView overlay showing whether its ComponentTree was computed on UI thread (red) or bg thread (green).

      • debugHighlightMountBounds

        public static boolean debugHighlightMountBounds
        Debug option to highlight mount bounds of mounted components.

      • isEndToEndTestRun

        public static boolean isEndToEndTestRun
        Populates additional metadata to find mounted components at runtime. Defaults to the presence of an 
        IS_TESTING
        system property at startup but can be overridden at runtime.

      • isAnimationDisabled

        public static boolean isAnimationDisabled

      • forceEnableTransitionsForInstrumentationTests

        public static boolean forceEnableTransitionsForInstrumentationTests
        By default end-to-end tests will disable transitions and this flag lets to explicitly enable transitions to test animation related behavior.

      • enableErrorBoundaryComponent

        public static boolean enableErrorBoundaryComponent

      • useGlobalKeys

        public static boolean useGlobalKeys
        If false, global keys will not be generated (litho level state updates won't work). It's highly discouraged to to change this to false, unless you handle all your updates outside of the litho framework

      • unmountAllWhenComponentTreeSetToNull

        public static boolean unmountAllWhenComponentTreeSetToNull
        Whether to unmount all contents of LithoView when its ComponentTree is set to null.

      • threadPoolForBackgroundThreadsConfig

        public static LayoutThreadPoolConfiguration threadPoolForBackgroundThreadsConfig
        Configuration for creating a thread pool of threads used for background layout. If null, a single default thread will be used for background layout.

      • threadPoolConfiguration

        public static LayoutThreadPoolConfiguration threadPoolConfiguration
        If non-null, a thread pool will be used for async layouts instead of a single layout thread.

      • enableThreadTracingStacktrace

        public static boolean enableThreadTracingStacktrace

      • inheritPriorityFromUiThread

        public static boolean inheritPriorityFromUiThread
        Whether the background thread that's currently running the layout should have its priority raised to the thread priority of the UI thread.

      • enableShouldCreateLayoutWithNewSizeSpec

        public static boolean enableShouldCreateLayoutWithNewSizeSpec
        Whether the OnShouldCreateLayoutWithNewSizeSpec is used with Layout Spec with size spec. This will also disable the associated layout caching.

      • ignoreDuplicateTransitionKeysInLayout

        public static boolean ignoreDuplicateTransitionKeysInLayout
        Ignore duplicate transition keys in the same layout, rather than throwing an exception.

      • onlyProcessAutogeneratedTransitionIdsWhenNecessary

        public static boolean onlyProcessAutogeneratedTransitionIdsWhenNecessary
        Enables more smart approach to processing autogenerated transition ids in TransitionManager.setupTransitions(), taking into account whether there are transitions that target all layout, and the fact that appear/disappear animations cannot be defined for autogenerated ids

      • isReconciliationEnabled

        public static boolean isReconciliationEnabled
        Sets if is reconciliation is enabled

      • isLayoutDiffingEnabled

        public static boolean isLayoutDiffingEnabled
        Sets if layout diffing is enabled. This should be used in conjugation with .

      • enableRenderInfoDebugging

        public static boolean enableRenderInfoDebugging
        If true, information about RenderInfos will be passed to Flipper's layout inspector.

      • useCancelableLayoutFutures

        public static boolean useCancelableLayoutFutures

      • canInterruptAndMoveLayoutsBetweenThreads

        public static boolean canInterruptAndMoveLayoutsBetweenThreads

      • disableGetAnnotationUsage

        public static boolean disableGetAnnotationUsage
        field.getAnnotation() has bugs which is causing java crashes in the App, in addition to this we suspect this might be a reason for few other native crashes as well. Adding this flag to verify if this is the root cause.

      • isPoolBisectEnabled

        public static boolean isPoolBisectEnabled
        Bisect mount pool to find the buggy implementation causing native crashes.

      • useSharedFutureOnParallel

        public static boolean useSharedFutureOnParallel

      • checkNeedsRemeasure

        public static boolean checkNeedsRemeasure
        If true, we also check if the RecyclerBinder needs remeasuring when checking if it's been measured.

      • disableComponentHostPool

        public static boolean disableComponentHostPool
        (Hopefully) temporary measure as we're investigating a major crash in libhwui.

      • perfBoosterFactory

        public static LithoPerfBoosterFactory perfBoosterFactory

      • boostPerfLayoutStateFuture

        public static boolean boostPerfLayoutStateFuture
        If true, the perfBoosterFactory will be used to indicate that LayoutStateFuture thread can use the perf boost

      • shouldUseDeepCloneDuringReconciliation

        public static boolean shouldUseDeepCloneDuringReconciliation
        When enabled reconciliation will use the deep clone method of the InternalNode with the simplified implementation of shallow copy.

      • useInternalNodesForLayoutDiffing

        public static boolean useInternalNodesForLayoutDiffing
        When enabled it would use Internal Nodes for layout diffing instead Diff Nodes.

      • incrementalVisibilityHandling

        public static boolean incrementalVisibilityHandling

      • shouldForceAsyncStateUpdate

        public static boolean shouldForceAsyncStateUpdate
        Enabling this will force all updateStateSync methods to be updateStateAsync. *

        public static boolean computeRangeOnSyncLayout
        Start parallel layout of visible range just before serial synchronous layouts in RecyclerBinder

      • shouldForceComponentUpdateOnOrientationChange

        public static boolean shouldForceComponentUpdateOnOrientationChange
        If false we won't force Component to update when Device Orientation change, and rely on its size change.

      • isIncrementalMountGloballyDisabled

        public static boolean isIncrementalMountGloballyDisabled
        When true, disables incremental mount globally.

      • keepInternalNodes

        public static boolean keepInternalNodes
        Keeps the internal nodes used for layout. This will increase memory use.

      • emitMessageForZeroSizedTexture

        public static boolean emitMessageForZeroSizedTexture

      • useStatelessComponent

        public static boolean useStatelessComponent
        When true, Layout-scoped info such as a Component's scoped Context are fetched from a LayoutState based on the Component's global key instead of reading fields from the Component instance.

        When true ComponentTree records state change snapshots

      • timelineDocsLink

        public static java.lang.String timelineDocsLink

      • ignoreNullLayoutStateError

        @Deprecated
public static boolean ignoreNullLayoutStateError
        Deprecated. 
        Only used for testing. If true, the framework will not throw an error if a null LayoutState is returned from a layout calculation in illegal cases (such as for a sync layout calculation).

        public static boolean interruptUseCurrentLayoutSource
